characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Focused on traits that appear consistently across their content, including directness and nuance.

characteristics.name: Tone
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as serious and objective, with a focus on fact-based reporting.

characteristics.name: Perspective
characteristics.description: Often takes a critical view of politicians and governments, with a focus on holding them accountable.

characteristics.name: Collaboration
characteristics.description: Values collaboration and working with others to achieve common goals, as seen in their engagement with other journalists and experts.

characteristics.name: Sense of Humor
characteristics.description: Rarely uses humor in their content, preferring a more serious and objective tone.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as detached and objective, without expressing strong emotions.

characteristics.name: Inclusivity
characteristics.description: Values inclusivity and diversity in their content, often highlighting the perspectives of underrepresented groups.

characteristics.name: Risk Tolerance
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as cautious and risk-averse, preferring to focus on verifiable facts rather than speculation.
